title: Apple Search Ads have been suspended on the App Store in Russia until further notice
content:
A source tells 9to5Mac that Apple has “no plans to shutdown the App Store in Russia.” However, it is disabling search ads for the time being. Apple Search Ads is a tool for customers to discover apps relevant to them while browsing the App Store. 

more…

The post Apple Search Ads have been suspended on the App Store in Russia until further notice appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A source tells 9to5Mac that Apple has “no plans to shutdown the App Store in Russia”. However, it is disabling Apple Search Ads.
